descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]===================================================[/size]
[b][size=6][color=#ff0000]﻿Song and Scene[/color] - [color=#ff7700]Main Menu Reborn[/color][/size][/b]
[size=6][/size][size=6]  ===================================================[/size]
Mod version v1.0[/center]
[size=4][center][b][i]Song and Scene - Main Menu Reborn[/i][/b]  gives the main menu a burst of life with a beautiful view of Skyrim's tundra, alongside the vocals of Malukah, who presents you with the song "Tale of Tongues" as you open your game. The two combined provide you a gorgeous menu before you begin your adventures.

Also provided optionally, there is the font Centaur, by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1156177]Valistar[/url]﻿. This doesn't come as one package as I am aware users do prefer to use their own fonts. But for people using the standard font, I highly recommend downloading the font, too. Adds a real spark of immersion!

[size=5][color=#ff7700]Requirements:[/color]
[size=4]- Latest version of Skyrim[/size]

[color=#ff7700]Installation: [/color]

[size=4]- Manually download the main file which includes the background and the music[/size]
[size=4]-*(optional)* Download the optional font package, too
-Once downloaded, drag the folder named "Data" into your current Data folder. This will automatically place all the sub folders into your data, saving you time.
-*(optional)* If you wish for the font also, then drag the "interface" folder into the Data folder. Let technology do the rest.
-Load up your game, and make sure there are no compatibilites. If so, tell me and I can help resolve them.

[size=5][color=#ff7700]Uninstallation:[/color]
[size=4]- Remove each file you have just added, which can be lengthy. I apologise.

[size=5][color=#ff7700]Credits:[/color]
[/size][/size][/size][/size][size=4] [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1156177]Valistar[/url][/size] [size=4]for the great fonts
Malukah for the amazing song
Bethesda for Skyrim
[/size]
[/size][b]===================================================================[/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]If you have any questions or suggestions for other menus, please feel free to ask![/color]
[size=4]===================================================================[/size]
[/b][/center][/size]
